db:abstract.db:para: Sets the FOLDER property for targets that belong to the QML linter.

db:article.db:para: This property was introduced in Qt 6.5.

db:note.db:para: This property is in technology preview and may change in future releases.

db:article.db:para: Name of the FOLDER for targets that are related to the QML linter.
By default, this property is set to QmlLinter.
This property only has an effect if CMake's USE_FOLDERS property is ON.
You can enable folder support by calling qt_standard_project_setup.
